action.action-desc: Mr. McGovern (for himself and Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to remove certain limitations with respect to commodity assistance for school breakfast programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthy Breakfasts Help Kids Learn Act of 2017.

section.header: Commodity assistance for school breakfast programs

subsection.text: Section 6(b) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1755(b)) is amended by inserting and the school breakfast program after school lunch program.
Section 6(c)(1) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1755(c)(1)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting for the school lunch program after 11 cents; and

by inserting The national average value of donated foods, or cash payments in lieu thereof, shall be 6 cents for the school breakfast program, adjusted on the first July 1 after the date of enactment of the Healthy Breakfast Help Kids Learn Act of 2017 and each July 1 thereafter to reflect the changes in the Price Index for Food Used in Schools and Institutions. after Institutions.;
by striking For each school year and inserting (i) For each school year;
by striking State for and inserting the following:
by striking subparagraph (B). and inserting the following:

subclause.text: for the school breakfast program shall be calculated by multiplying the number of breakfasts served in the preceding school year by the rate established by subparagraph (B).

subclause.text: the number of breakfasts served by schools in each State with the number of breakfasts served by schools in each State during the preceding school year and increase or reduce subsequent commodity assistance or cash in lieu thereof provided to each State based on such reconciliation.

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (E), by inserting and school breakfast program after school lunch program.

subsection.header: Repeal of limitation on commodity assistance for school breakfast
subsection.text: Section 6 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1755), as amended by subsection (a), is further amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (e) and (f) as subsections (d) and (e), respectively.
